WebMessage.name: kmsgMktgEditSegmentEmptyFilterCaption

There are no criteria currently included. Click on a field in the selection pane to add a criteria.
If no criteria are included, the criteria block will Keep, Exclude, or Add all customer records that exist in the subject area (based on the selected operator).

WebMessage.name: kmsgMktgEditSelectionRuleEmptyFilterCaption
WebMessage.HTML:
There are no criteria currently included. Click on a field in the selection pane to add a criteria.
If no criteria are included, the criteria block will Include or Exclude all customer records that exist in the subject area (based on the selected operator).

The specified criteria didn't result in any data. This is often caused by applying filters that are too restrictive or that contain incorrect values. Please check your Filters and try again.

WebMessage.TEXT: آیا شما مطمئن هستید که می خواهید لیست کش خذف کنید؟

WebMessage.name: kmsgMktgWarningPurgeSRS
WebMessage.TEXT: آیا شما مطمئن هستید که می خواهید مجموعه نتیجه ذخیره شده را خذف کنید؟

WebMessage.name: kmsgMktgWhenSegmentArchived
WebMessage.TEXT: زمانیکه می خواهید این بخش را آرشیو شود؟

WebMessage.name: kmsgMktgWhenSegmentSaved
WebMessage.TEXT: زمانیکه می خواهید این بخش ذخیره شود؟

WebMessage.name: kmsgNoSRSCreatedYet
WebMessage.HTML: برای این بخش مجموعه نتیجه ذخیره شده ایجاد نشده است

WebMessage.name: kmsgNoSegmentCriteriaYet
WebMessage.HTML: لهیچ یک از عناصر معیار در این بخش وجود دارد

WebMessage.name: kmsgNoSegmentTreeEANodes
WebMessage.HTML: برای این درخت مخاطب واجد شرایط ارائه نشده است

WebMessage.name: kmsgNoSegmentTreeNodesYet
WebMessage.HTML: در این درخت بخش هیچ بخش وجود ندارد

WebMessage.name: kmsgSaveFromCriteriaEditorSegment
WebMessage.TEXT: Please save segment from the criteria editor tab and continue with the operation.

WebMessage.name: kmsgSaveFromCriteriaEditorSegmentTree
WebMessage.TEXT: Please save segment-tree from the criteria editor tab and continue with the operation.

WebMessage.name: kmsgSaveQuestionSegment
WebMessage.TEXT: آیا شما می خواهید بخش با فیلتر ذخیره شود؟

WebMessage.name: kmsgSaveQuestionSegmentTree
WebMessage.TEXT: آیا شما می خواهید درخت بخش با فیلتر ذخیره شود؟

WebMessage.name: kmsgSegmentCriteriaEditorSetCriteriaInfo
WebMessage.HTML: Click on fields in the selection pane to add new criteria to the request. Drag and drop to reorder or group criteria blocks. Change the filters for a block by clicking the menu icon.

WebMessage.name: kmsgSegmentTreeCriteriaEditorInfo
WebMessage.HTML: Click on segments in the selection pane to add a new segment to the segment tree. Drag and drop to reorder branches of the tree. Apply splits or samples on a branch by selecting Split/Sample from the menu.

WebMessage.name: kmsgSegmentTreeSRSSaveNewStaticSegment
WebMessage.TEXT: پوشه مقصد را انتخاب کنید و بخش ایستا را ذخیره نمایید

WebMessage.name: kmsgSegmentTreesEntryBrowseRequests
WebMessage.TEXT: باز کردن درخت بخش ذخیره شده

WebMessage.name: kmsgSegmentTreesEntryBrowseRequestsDesc
WebMessage.TEXT: To view segment trees saved in the Catalog, use the Segment Trees tab to the left. Click a segment tree name to view or modify it.

WebMessage.name: kmsgSegmentTreesEntryCreateRequestDesc
WebMessage.TEXT: لبرای ایجاد درخت بخش جدید، سطح هدف را انتخاب نمایید.

WebMessage.name: kmsgSegmentTreesEntryStartPage
WebMessage.TEXT: This is the start page for Segment Trees. Return to this page by clicking the Marketing link.

WebMessage.name: kmsgSegmentsEntryBrowseRequestsDesc
WebMessage.TEXT: To view segments saved in the Catalog, use the Segments tab to the left. Click a segment name to view or modify it.

WebMessage.name: kmsgSegmentsEntryCreateRequestDesc
WebMessage.TEXT: لبرای ایجاد یک بخش جدید، سطح هدف انتخاب را انتخاب نمایید.

WebMessage.name: kmsgSegmentsEntryStartPage
WebMessage.TEXT: This is the start page for the Segment Designer. Return to this page by clicking the Marketing link.

WebMessage.name: kmsgVisualSegReportXMLError
WebMessage.HTML: Unable to convert a set report into a Marketing segment because of invalid or missing report XML definition. Please verify that the report can run in Answers or in a Dashboard and does not contain any set operations.

WebMessage.name: kmsgWriteListCampaignNameInfo
WebMessage.HTML: کمپین:

WebMessage.name: kmsgWriteListFilesInvalidAlias
WebMessage.TEXT: Invalid Alias Format at Column No : (Required Format: Table_Name.Column_Name).

WebMessage.name: kmsgWriteListFilesMissingAlias
WebMessage.TEXT: At least one of the columns in the list format does not have an alias specified. The alias should be the same as the physical table column name you want to write to.

WebMessage.name: kmsgWriteListFilesMissingTreeNodePath
WebMessage.HTML: Invalid input parameter to write list files. The system is unable to determine the tree target cell to requalify. "treeNode" must be specified in conjunction with "treePath".

WebMessage.name: kmsgWriteListFilesNoColumns
WebMessage.TEXT: The list file cannot be generated because it has no columns.

WebMessage.name: kmsgWriteListFilesSQLExecutionFailed
WebMessage.HTML: Error executing the list generation SQL.

WebMessage.name: kmsgWriteListFilesSQLGenerationFailed
WebMessage.HTML: Error generating the list generation SQL. Verify that the list format columns and filters, and options are valid.

WebMessage.name: kmsgWriteListFilesShortInfo
WebMessage.HTML: Writing list format: to location:

WebMessage.name: kmsgWriteToFilesNoSegmentsToRequalify
WebMessage.HTML: Unable to re-qualify list with segmentation criteria because no segments have been specified for input.
